DOCNAME: SUMILA AND OTHERS v. THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA
JUDGES: Giovanni Bonello;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Mihai Poalelungi;Nebojša Vučinić;Nicolas Bratza
TEXT: The applicants are all NORP nationals . They were represented before the ORG by PERSON . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

All the applicants were employees of ORG ( “ the Ministry ” ) . DATE the applicants initiated proceedings against ORG for miscalculating their pensions ( applications nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL/CARDINAL and PERSON ) and failing to pay compensation for dangerous working conditions ( application no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .
They all obtained final judgments in their favour and enforcement warrants were issued .
On DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE respectively , the final judgments in favour of PERSON , PERSON , Mr PERSON , PERSON ORG , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON NORP were fully enforced .
